name: Attic
longDes: You are standing in the attic. It is warm up here, and surprisingly bright. There are windows to the North, East, South, and West, overlooking the mansion grounds and woods beyond. A flash of light catches your eye to the North. You see some toys scattered about the floor. You see a curious little rock on one windowsill. The room is not as big as you would have thought. Instead of being perfectly square, a corner of the attic to the southwest seems to be walled off. The only exit is back down the stairs to the pink room on the second floor.
shortDes: You are in the attic of the mansion. Dust hangs lightly in the warm air. Toys are scattered about, and there are windows to the north, east, south, and west. A steep staircase leads back down to the pink room below.

startingItems.name: crystal
startingItems.description: A glowing crystal - a good source of light.

features.name: windowsill
features.preActionDes: You see a small crystal in the window sill. It looks like it is glowing lightly.
features.inActionDes: You find a smooth crystal. It feels right in your hands.
features.postActionDes: This is where you discovered the smooth crystal.

features.name: corner
features.preActionDes: This area of the room appears to be boarded off.

features.name: east window
features.preActionDes: You look out the window. All you see is the beginning of a large forest.

features.name: west window
features.preActionDes: You look out the window. You can see the garden out this window.

features.name: south window
features.preActionDes: You look out the window. You can see the front porch from here.

features.name: north window
features.preActionDes: You look out the window. You can see the gazebo from here

features.name: toys
features.preActionDes: There are many toys here. You see dolls, horses, and a pad of paper with some colored pencils. They are dusty with disuse.
